website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Miix 2 8 is an affordable Windows 8 tablet with good battery life and features. Just make sure you always have access to the Internet, as local storage is a little light on this tablet.
cons: Only 9 GB of storage free after initial setup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet with limited memory
customer_reviews.text: Every think works on this tablet apart from the keyboard which often does not pop up or down requiring extra tap. The WIN 8 is different than WIN 7 and takes some getting used to. There seems to be more steps for doing the same thing which could be done much more easily on WIN 7. I am astonished by electronics pricing in EU they seem to be nearly 40-50% more than the US prices and for this at least manufacturers should put extra memory in European models. It remains beyond my understanding why the consumers in so called social welfare states of EU are ripped off more than the US.
customer_reviews.author: kashif

customer_reviews.title: the tablet is fast with a good display. If you're looking for a cheap Windows ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing. I had problems with the touch-screen, vibration and the buttons from the start. To their credit, Lenovo repaired the product promptly and I've had no problems since. Hardware is a bit cheap. It's a little heavy, sound is tinny. Windows 8 needs a lot of work, but the upcoming Windows 10 looks promising. This all said, the tablet is fast with a good display. If you're looking for a cheap Windows tablets, this is a good bet, especially for work. However, most consumers would be better served by rival android tablets at this price point. Or spend a little more and get an iPad Mini 2.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet, rubbish drivers.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet design, awful software/drivers/firmware from Lenovo with Windows 8 and Windows 10. BSOD every time you open the camera, this also affects other tablets such as the Dell Venue Pro 8 (awful Intel drivers). The only reason I bought this was because of the screen size and the full version of Office 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, shame about the support
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine, unfortunately no veriface software as advertised on Lenovo website (which would make logging on much, much easier). Their technical support team pretended to be surprised when I called - they obviously haven't seen the similar complaints on the internet since December last. They suggested it was Amazon's fault for buying bulk and getting them cheaper?? Amazon offered me a no quibble replacement immediately (great service as usual), but don't see any point as the replacement won't have the veriface either! Apart from the aforegoing the tablet performs very well, especially with the IVSO keyboard (provided, just a shame that companies like Lenovo still get away with treating their customers with complete indifference.
customer_reviews.author: M D Kleinberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for personal use, but cannot use for work emails as does not support Device Encryption
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for personal use and great value for the deal I managed to get at. However it does not support Device Encryption which means that I cannot use it for work e-mails. Most corporate emails will use ActiveSynch which require Device Encryption, so this is a big weakness.

product_meta.title: Lenovo Miix2 8-inch Tablet (Silver) - (Intel Atom 1.33GHz, 2GB RAM, 32GB eMMC, WLAN, BT, 2x Camera, Windows 8.1)
product_meta.description:
LENOVO MIIX2 8 TABLET
MIIX UP YOUR ENTERTAINMENT 
The 8-inch Lenovo Miix2 8 is a Windows tablet that combines an 8-inch HD wide-view display with powerful quad-core processing and an optional detachable case and stylus-pen. This makes it ideal for light, productive tasks and web browsing while on the go. You can also get productive, as the Miix2 8 comes preloaded with Office Home & Student 2013. Weighing just 350gm, the Lenovo Miix2 8 features a slim 8.35mm design with a textured rear cover for better grip.

AT A GLANCE
 *  Intel Atom Quad-Core processor 
 *  8-inch HD display (1,280 x 800) WXGA display with IPS technology 
 *  Up to 2GB LPDDR3 memory and up to 128GB eMMC storage
 *  Integrated graphics 
 *  Bluetooth connectivity 
 * Up to 7 house battery life

Switch instantly from a tablet to a notebook. A MINI WINDOWS TABLET THAT IS GREAT FOR MOBILE PRODUCTIVITY
The Miix2 8 features multi-touch technology. MULTI-TOUCH DISPLAY
The Miix2 8 features multi-touch technology for the ability to effortlessly control apps, browse the web, and play engaging games. This innovative screen is sensitive and easy to use with five fingers at once, making typing easier and offering a responsive gaming experience.

FRONT AND REAR-FACING WEBCAMS
Take your web chats to the next level thanks to the built-in 5MP rear and 2.0MP front-facing webcams which let you stream higher-definition images, giving you clearer picture, perfect for capturing those special moments on photo and video and sharing them with your friends and family through video chats. 

VERIFACE PRO
Log-in to your Miix2 8 tablet securely with the VeriFace Pro facial recognition technology. VeriFace Pro identifies users by matching features to their face using the front-facing webcam, making accessing your Miix2 8 tablet easy and quick. 

MICRO-SD CARD SLOT AND MICRO-USB PORT 
If you need more space for your favourite multimedia the expansion slot allows you to insert micro-SDHC memory cards and micro-USB devices into your tablet. This means you can expand your storage space and transfer files between mobile devices easily. You can also swap videos and photos directly with your camera.

The Miix2 8 offers an optional stylus pen. OPTIMISED FOR ENTERTAINMENT
POWERFUL INTEL ATOM PROCESSOR 
The Intel Atom quad-core processor is designed to keep you moving -- allowing you to listen, watch and play without worrying about the battery life. Enjoy fast web-browsing, super-responsive apps and seamless downloads, all with your Miix2 8 tablet.

The Miix2 8 offers an 8-inch HD wide-view display. FAST MEMORY AND SPACIOUS STORAGE
Inside the Lenovo Miix2 8 you'll find up to 2GB LPDDR3 RAM and up to 128GB built-in storage space and a Micro SD slot for additional capacity to help your tablet handle the most demanding multitasking. You'll also find a large hard drive perfect for storing your files and favourite multimedia.

INTEGRATED BLUETOOTH 4.0 
The Miix2 8 comes with multiple wireless connection options. The built-in 802.11b/g/n Wi-Fi adapter will allow you to enjoy reliable connections to the internet, whether at home or on a public network, while Bluetooth 4.0 is available to make it easier to connect and share files with other devices. 

LONG-LASTING BATTERY LIFE
The Miix2 8 comes with a long-life 6800 mAh li-polymer battery, so you can get the most out of your tablet between charges. With Wi-Fi connected you will be able to enjoy up to 7 hours of online productivity and entertainment on the go before needing to top up the charge.

WINDOWS TABLET
WINDOWS 8.1 WITH LENOVO ENHANCED EXPERIENCE 8
Created specifically for Microsoft’s Windows 8.1 OS, Lenovo has combined hardware and software features to form Lenovo Enhanced Experience 8.

Lenovo Cloud - Imagine your files, everywhere. Lenovo's online storage and cloud utilities allow you the freedom to choose your device and location. With 5 GB of free storage, you'll be able to secure and access your files wherever you are, and on whatever machine you find yourself on.

Exclusive Lenovo Content - Discover all the amazing things you can do with exclusive tools from Lenovo. Learn how to get the most from your PC with Lenovo Companion or monitor your system performance with Lenovo Support. Lenovo keeps you up to date and delivers music, game and video content you can get from no one else.

With Lenovo Energy Management 7.0, choose between three main automatic settings - energy saver, normal, and turbo, or access further advanced settings options through the system settings menu. Protect and prolong the battery health using battery protection mode, and battery gauge.
